Security is really important when handling bitcoins. One easy safeguard is to make sure the programs you download are actually what you think they are using hashes and signatures.

In this post, I essentially follow the MultiBit tutorial. I’m using 64-bit Windows 7.

Verifying Hashes

Most software you download from the internet should provide a hash that you can verify to make sure the file was not corrupted or altered. Multibit provides SHA256 hashes here.
